üëâüèªThe new performing arts center in Lower Manhattan is a dynamic home for the arts, serving audiences and creators through flexible venues enabling the facility to embrace wide-ranging artistic programs. The inaugural year will feature commissions, world premieres, co-productions, and collaborative work across theater, dance, music, opera, film, and more. 

üí°The vision for PAC NYC first began 20 years ago when Mike Bloomberg, as Mayor of New York City, included a performing arts center as the cultural keystone in the master plan to rebuild the World Trade Center site following 9/11.

Bold Tribeca Apartment | @crina_architecture

How to make a color infused apartment for a sophisticated, design obsessed, almost color blind client? 

This was the mission Crina Arghirescu Rogard had to fulfill as she embarked on reimagining the architecture and decoration of a Tribeca three bedroom apartment located on the 21st floor of a new glass clad building.

@snohetta‚Äôs Beijing City Library has opened doors for visitors as the world's largest climatized reading space üìö

The new library is located in Tongzhou District, a designated sub-center of Beijing that is often considered the eastern gateway of the capital. As one of three new major cultural buildings in Tongzhou, the Beijing City Library further establishes the area as both a vibrant district in itself and an extension of Beijing's urban fabric. It anchors the neighborhood's ambitious masterplan and will help to catalyze its transformation from a relatively undeveloped area into a lively arts and cultural destination.

#TinyApartments #Archilovers

In this single-family home designed by architect Marco Ortalli, the material brushstroke of concrete plays the leading role of the project. The interior space is carefully calibrated, designed to synchronize with the rhythm of the family‚Äôs daily routines. 

Enlightened by warmth and spaciousness, this living area invites all who enter to sit and relax. The Perry #sofa designed by Antonio Citterio for #Flexform is the ideal vantage point for full immersion in the perfectly framed views. Or, enjoy the ever-changing light-play of time and season from the soft contours of the Feel Good armchair.

Follow @flexformspa to discover more
